entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
